original_text: I will cause all the nations that you meet to be afraid. All the people who attack you will become confused. I will cause all your enemies to turn round and run away from you.
korean_text: 내가 내 위엄을 네 앞서 보내어 네가 이를 곳의 모든 백성을 물리치고 네 모든 원수들이 네게 등을 돌려 도망하게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will cause all the nations
that you meet to be afraid
All the people who attack you
I will cause all your enemies
to turn round and run away from you
